verses.text: \w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* thou art inexcusable, \w O|strong="G5599"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, whosoever thou art \w that|strong="G3739"\w* judgest. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* wherein thou judgest \w another|strong="G2087"\w*, thou condemnest thyself. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* thou dost \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* thou judgest.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G3754"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2917"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w*, \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w them|strong="G2596"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w do|strong="G4238"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \w things|strong="G5108"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* thinkest thou \w this|strong="G3778"\w*, \w O|strong="G5599"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* judgest \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* dost \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* thou shalt \w escape|strong="G1628"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2917"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*?

\w Or|strong="G2228"\w* despisest thou \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w riches|strong="G4149"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* goodness, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w patience|strong="G3115"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* longsuffering? Knowest thou \w not|strong="G2532"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* benignity \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* leadeth thee \w to|strong="G1519"\w* penance?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* thy hardness \w and|strong="G2532"\w* impenitent \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, thou treasurest \w up|strong="G2343"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* thyself \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w*, \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w revelation|strong="G0602"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w just|strong="G2532"\w* \w judgment|strong="G1341"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w will|strong="G3739"\w* \w render|strong="G0591"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w every|strong="G2596"\w* \w man|strong="G1538"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*.

\w To|strong="G2596"\w* \w them|strong="G2596"\w* \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w patience|strong="G5281"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*, \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* honour \w and|strong="G2532"\w* incorruption, \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3982"\w* \w that|strong="G3982"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* contentious, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w obey|strong="G3982"\w* \w not|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* give credit \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w iniquity|strong="G0093"\w*, \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w indignation|strong="G2372"\w*.

\w Tribulation|strong="G2347"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w anguish|strong="G2347"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w soul|strong="G5590"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w that|strong="G3956"\w* worketh \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*, \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Greek|strong="G1672"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* honour, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G3956"\w* worketh \w good|strong="G0018"\w*, \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Greek|strong="G1672"\w*.
\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* respect \w of|strong="G2316"\w* persons \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* whosoever \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w sinned|strong="G0264"\w* \w without|strong="G0460"\w* \w the|strong="G1223"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w perish|strong="G0622"\w* \w without|strong="G0460"\w* \w the|strong="G1223"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* whosoever \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w sinned|strong="G0264"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1223"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w judged|strong="G2919"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1223"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w hearers|strong="G0202"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w just|strong="G1342"\w* \w before|strong="G3844"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w doers|strong="G4163"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w shall|strong="G1342"\w* \w be|strong="G2316"\w* \w justified|strong="G1344"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w by|strong="G1438"\w* \w nature|strong="G5449"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G3551"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*; \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w to|strong="G3778"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3588"\w* shew \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w* \w of|strong="G3551"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w written|strong="G1123"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*, \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w* \w bearing|strong="G4828"\w* \w witness|strong="G4828"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w thoughts|strong="G3053"\w* \w between|strong="G3342"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w accusing|strong="G2723"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w defending|strong="G0626"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*,

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w shall|strong="G0444"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w secrets|strong="G2927"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w my|strong="G1722"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* thou art called \w a|strong="G1487"\w* \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* restest \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* makest thy \w boast|strong="G2744"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* knowest \w his|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* approvest \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w more|strong="G1308"\w* profitable \w things|strong="G3588"\w*, being \w instructed|strong="G2727"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*,

Art \w confident|strong="G3982"\w* \w that|strong="G3982"\w* thou thyself art \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w guide|strong="G3595"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w blind|strong="G5185"\w*, \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G3982"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w*,

\w An|strong="G2192"\w* instructor \w of|strong="G3551"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w foolish|strong="G0878"\w*, \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w teacher|strong="G1320"\w* \w of|strong="G3551"\w* \w infants|strong="G3516"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w form|strong="G3446"\w* \w of|strong="G3551"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G3551"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

Thou \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w that|strong="G3767"\w* teachest \w another|strong="G2087"\w*, teachest \w not|strong="G3756"\w* thyself: thou \w that|strong="G3767"\w* preachest \w that|strong="G3767"\w* men should \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w steal|strong="G2813"\w*, stealest:

Thou \w that|strong="G3004"\w* sayest, men should \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w commit|strong="G3431"\w* \w adultery|strong="G3431"\w*, committest \w adultery|strong="G3431"\w*: thou \w that|strong="G3004"\w* abhorrest \w idols|strong="G1497"\w*, committest sacrilege:

Thou \w that|strong="G3739"\w* makest thy \w boast|strong="G2744"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w transgression|strong="G3847"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* dishonourest \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

(\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w blasphemed|strong="G0987"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w it|strong="G1223"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*.)

\w Circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* profiteth \w indeed|strong="G1063"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* thou keep \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* thou \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w transgressor|strong="G3848"\w* \w of|strong="G3551"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, thy \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1437"\w*, \w then|strong="G3767"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w uncircumcised|strong="G0203"\w* \w keep|strong="G5442"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* justices \w of|strong="G3551"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, shall \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w* \w be|strong="G3767"\w* \w counted|strong="G3049"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3551"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w nature|strong="G5449"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w*, \w if|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G1223"\w* fulfill \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* thee, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w letter|strong="G1121"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* art \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w transgressor|strong="G3848"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w it|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w he|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w so|strong="G1063"\w* outwardly; \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w that|strong="G2453"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* outwardly \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w a|strong="G3739"\w* \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w one|strong="G3739"\w* \w inwardly|strong="G2927"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w letter|strong="G1121"\w*; \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w praise|strong="G1868"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.
